objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has downloaded additional tools, such as [TEARDROP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0560) malware and [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154), to a compromised host following initial access.(Citation: FireEye SUNBURST Backdoor December 2020)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2020, December 13). Highly Evasive Attacker Leverages SolarWinds Supply Chain to Compromise Multiple Global Victims With SUNBURST Backdoor. Retrieved January 4, 2021.
